type.description:
## Attack Target

---


[Bi-entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_condition_types/attack_target)

Checks if the actor entity is currently aggressive to the target entity.

Type ID: `origins:attack_target`

---

### Examples

```json
"bientity_condition": {
    "type": "origins:attack_target"
}
```

title: Attack Target (Bi-entity Condition Type) date: 2021-10-08

Attack Target

Bi-entity Condition Type
